title: Citizens in uniform
brief_description: The soldier of the Bundeswehr has to submit to a hard training suitable to meet the requirements of a technical age. He also has rights which underline his equal position as a citizen. As a member of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, the German Republic must contribute its share against the Communist threat.
